overview: our boss asks you to take care of an important pendrive which contains sensitive business information. A request like this equals a promotion and the gorgeous boss lady makes sure to celebrate it accordingly. But when you relay the item to your clumsy assistant, they lose it. How will you punish the sexy trio of dumb bitches? And a day later, why does the sexy daughter of your boss show up at your doorstep with yet another pendrive? Questions and mysteries you have to answer and reveal yourself.
title: Office Issues
